interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2015/12/16
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Michael Watkins'], 'Starring': ['James Spader', 'Diego Klattenhoff', 'Megan Boone']}
Review Text: I started watching this series on Amazon and couldn't stop. I literally watched all three seasons in just a few days. It was THAT good. Can't wait for Season 4. Love the plot and characters. Great acting by all, but especially James Spader.
Review Title: Hooked on Blacklist!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
